name: Excavatris Inc.
description:
Description

Tetris with a pre-filled bottomless pit and gimmicks!

Instructions
  • Clear the pit of the lines to get deeper.
  • Charge abilities by clearing lines.
  • See how far you can get!
Controls
  • Left/Right: Move Tetrimino around.
  • Up: Rotate Tetrimino clockwise.
  • Down: Drop Tetrimino faster.
  • Space: Instantly drop Tetrimino.
  • Shift: Hold Tetrimino.
  • RCtrl: Rotate Tetrimino counterclockwise.
  • Q/E: Move the Ability Pointer.
  • 1: Explosive Missile. Takes 2 lines to charge.
  • 2: Laserbeam, clearing 3 columns to the bottom. Takes 10 lines to charge.
  • 3: Earthquake, dropping everything to the bottom of the screen. Takes 25 lines to charge.
  • P/Esc: Pause.
Credits

Coding and art by Neon Glass team 
Music by Aleks SHAGI

Known Bugs
  • WebGL version may randomly crash after the Game Over cutscene
